info.title: REST Countries API
info.description:
**Disclaimer** - This *OpenAPI* specification was generated with the tool *RESTSpecIT*. Even though the tool verifies as much as possible the model responses, mistakes and/or inaccuracies may be found in the generated specification. Thus, data such as the license or the e-mail of the API should still be manually verified. Moreover, invalid query parameters are often ignored in *nearly* valid requests, as RESTful APIs tend to apply the **robustness principle**. This principle states that *programs receiving messages should accept non-conformant input as long as the meaning is clear*. As the validity of such parameters is difficult to verify, some described parameters may result in false positives. Query parameters that were found but did not specify a value have their schema type set to **x-null**.

**Be Reassured** - The tool *RESTSpecIT* has been thouroughly tested on various APIs. Additionally, the tool is capable of discovering undocumented and valid routes and query parameters of APIs.

**API Description** - REST Countries API is a free API that provides information about countries all over the world, including details such as population, area, borders, and more.

servers.description: Production Server of the REST Countries API.

externalDocs.description: Find more about the REST Countries API here:
